long_description: The bambu Spork & Cork utensil is a compact 2-in-1 utensil that's easy to take along in your travel bag, in the car, your backpack, or to keep in your desk at work. Spork is handcrafted from a single piece of certified organic bamboo; naturally stain resistant and antimicrobial. Includes a durable and washable cork fabric sleeve that protects your spork when you're on the go. Clean the bambu Spork & Cork utensil in hot soapy water and wipe dry; not recommended for dishwasher or prolonged soaking.
short_description: The bambu Spork & Cork utensil is a compact 2-in-1 utensil that's easy to take along in your travel bag, in the car, your backpack, or to keep in your desk at work.
